name: Wild Ink (HOU Mai)
description:
Wild Ink

Ink fighting game. Use Dash to Kill

If both players are dashing, no one will be killed.

Player 1:
WASD - Move
C - Jump
V - Dash / Attack / Block

Player 2:
IJKL - Move
[ - Jump
] - Dash / Attack

\ - Turn on a dummy AI
R - Restart

Xbox One Controller:
Left Stick - Move
A - Jump
RB - Dash / Attack
Start - Restart

Download builds have a higher framerate which look better.

Made in a week for Prototype Studio at NYU Game Center

Prompt: Personal Prompt ↓

Instructor: Bennett Foddy
